athena:
Tau slice, H->tautau sample, pu46 TauSlice, H->tautau sample, pu46 EventMax=4000; TrigInDetValidation_RTT_topOptions_TauSlice Trigger/TrigValidation/TrigInDetValidation TrigInDetValidation long
# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_tau_sample2.xml"
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-tau.root -b Test_bin.dat
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau.root data-tau-reference.root EF_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_InDetTrigParticleCreation_Tau_EFID -d EF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau.root data-tau-reference.root L2_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_0 L2_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_1 L2_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_2 L2_tau29_IDTrkNoCut_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_3 -d L2-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau.root data-tau-pu46-reference-newchains.root HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_InDetTrigTrackingxAODCnv_Tau_EFID -d HLTEF-plots
RttLibraryTools ExeRunner
exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
exeParamString data-tau.root data-tau-pu46-reference-newchains.root HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_1 HLT_tau20_r1_idperf_TrigL2SiTrackFinder_Tau_2 -d HLTL2-plots
# include "TrigInDetValidation_expertMonitoring.xml" # include "TrigInDetValidation_costMonitoring.xml"

TIDAdata*.dat data-tau-reference.root data-tau-pu46-reference-newchains.root expert-monitoring-tau_pu46-ref.root # include "TrigInDetValidation_aux.xml" Test_bin.dat
